content.description: This is the left of two climbs that are south of Lazy Dome on a south facing formation. This excellent climb has maybe 5 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: Hike south up the jumble of boulders from the Grey Giant a few hundred yards until you can scramble up and right to near the base of two bolted sport climbs.  One aid move up a blank section off a bolt gets you to the base of the climbs.

content.description: This climb is the right of two climbs on a South Facing formation south (to the left) of Lazy Dome. It is an excellent climb. Climb up past about 5 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor.
content.protection: Quick draws only. Rap anchor on top.
content.location: To get to this climb, hike up the jumbled rocks between the Tombstone and Lazy Dome, heading south from the Grey Giant.  When you see the formation with the climbs on it, scramble up and to the right to get to it.  Unfortunately, on the approach to get to the base, you must make one aid move (off a bolt) through a steep blank section just before you get to a ledge at the base of the climbs; irritating, but it goes quick.
